bibo:Webpage.dcterms:title: When your self-driving car crashes, you could still be the one who gets sued — Quartz
bibo:Webpage.dcterms:abstract: In 1969, Milton Packin was pulled over for speeding on a New Jersey highway. He appealed the ticket, claiming that he wasn’t driving the car; it was the cruise control’s fault. The judge was neither convinced nor amused. “A motorist who entrusts his car to the control of an automatic device is ‘driv
